Title: Relates to applicants for a driver's license who have suffered a loss of consciousness resulting from the impact of a collision
Summary: Excludes applicants for a driver's license or renewal who have suffered a loss of consciousness caused by a collision from persons required to submit physicians' statements as a condition of licensing; requires the commissioner to provide a notice of suspension electronically in addition to mailing such notice where the licensee has an active online account with DMV.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to applicants for a driver's license who have suffered a loss of consciousness resulting from the impact of a collision
